import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' //component imports import Introduction from './Views/Introduction' import HomePageRouter from './Views/HomePageRouter' import Contact from './Views/Contact' import DeFi from './Views/DeFi' import Projects from './Views/Projects' //other imports import styled from 'styled-components' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, } from 'react-router-dom' const Home: React.FC = () => { const [likesDark, setLikesDark] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { if (window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme)').media !== 'not all') { setLikesDark(true) } }, [setLikesDark]) return (<> {likesDark ?
:
} ) } const StyledDiv = styled.div` display: flex; flex-flow: column; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; border-radius: 4px; justify-content: center; width: 80%; height: 90%; background-color: #008B8B; ` const StyledSpacer = styled.div` height: 15px; width: 100%; ` export default Home
